answers.answer: It is normal to have a little swelling but you should go to a doctor and make sure you don't have preeclampsia.

question: my feet n legs have been swelling up really bad n its really hard to even walk sometimes...it just started like a week ago when I got a cold n today I realized my hands are starting to swell to...is this normal or could it just be from the cold???
title: swelling???
